articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Kumkop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspersons
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Kumkop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspersons
						
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Kumkop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspersons.
					 He said that the factory was built just few years ago but it is well known to the country and the popularity of its products and demand for them are daily increasing.
					
					 He went round different places of the factory to learn in detail about its production and management.
					
					  He was pleased that the factory is producing a large quantity of foodstuff with small manpower and not big area for production.
					
					 He praised the factory for producing diverse varieties of foodstuff, turning out packing materials by itself and packing products in a cultured manner by applying advanced technology to it.
					
					 The factory is playing an important role not only in the sports field but also in developing the nation's food industry, he noted.
					
					  He underscored the need for the factory to put main emphasis on boosting the production of varieties of foodstuff helpful to the care for nutrition of sportspersons and their recovery from fatigue and steadily improving their quality.
					
					 He said that the factory should wage a dynamic drive for developing and producing foodstuff including chewing gum which are badly needed by the sportspersons and suited to the constitution of the Koreans, not resting content with the successes already made.
					
					 He instructed the factory to thoroughly ensure the hygienic safety of foodstuff by introducing information technology into management activities and putting the production processes on an automated, unmanned, germ-free and dust-free basis at a high level, while keeping the production going at a high rate. 
					
					 He went round the cultural and welfare facilities and greenhouse of the factory.
					
					 Saying that the secret of successes in all work entirely lies in how the officials work, he highly appreciated the merits officials of the field concerned and factory including Ri Jong Ho performed by successfully managing it and doing business with innovative eyes to implement the party's policy.
					
					 He expressed belief and conviction that the officials and employees of the factory would play a pace-setter's role in developing the sports and foodstuff industry of the country.
					
					 He had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Ri Il Hwan and Han Kwang Sang, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Neither Sanctions Nor Pressure Can Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Neither Sanctions Nor Pressure Can Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) --The United States announced that it would stage joint military maneuvers from the beginning of March, insisting that it cannot cancel Key Resolve and Foal Eagle because they are "drills for defense."
					 Timed to coincide with this, provocative outbursts extremely rattling the nerves of the DPRK are heard from the U.S.  Riff-raffs vied with each other to claim at a recent Congressional hearing that it is necessary to use all possible means to force north Korea to dismantle nukes and missiles.
					
					 They are crying out for tightening the sanctions against the DPRK with not only its vassal forces but countries around the Korean peninsula involved, urging it to observe regulations and norms of international law and asserting that Pyongyang should be re-listed as a sponsor of terrorism.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is scheming to bring the situation on the peninsula to the brink of a war this year, too, by pursuing a policy for pressure upon the DPRK, not for detente. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 There is no reason for the U.S. not to cancel the projected joint saber-rattling if it is truly concerned for peace and security on the peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. is talking about "observance of regulations and norms of international law" while brandishing the stick of sanctions against the DPRK. This is absolutely illogical.
					
					 The DPRK will not recognize all sorts of unreasonable resolutions on sanctions cooked up by the hostile forces to infringe upon its sovereignty and will never be bound to them in the future, too. 
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can bring the Korean people who regard independence as their life and soul to their knees through sanctions.
					
					 Pressure will not help solve any issue.
					
					 Whoever comes in attack, ignorant of his rival, is bound to suffer a big setback. The U.S. would be well advised to properly understand its rival and approach it.
					
					 No vicious and sinister trick and method can ever work on the DPRK as it has the great Songun politics and such powerful weapon as single-minded unity.
					
					 The U.S. had better make a bold policy switchover, not clinging to its reckless hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: International Community Urges U.S. to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
International Community Urges U.S. to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The international community is strongly demanding the U.S. make a bold policy switchover, not clinging to its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and reckless moves for aggression.
					 The Indonesian paper Suara Karya said that such tragedy as territorial partition and national division persists only on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK at a time when the leftovers of the Second World War are disappearing with the passage of time and a balanced position is being ensured among countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan said:
					
					 The U.S. has persistently pursued a hostile policy toward the DPRK in a bid to bring down its socialist system, deliberately escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The "human rights issue" in the DPRK about which the U.S. is noisily trumpeting is no more than sophism contrary to its reality.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the U.S. is chiefly to blame for the tense situation on the Korean peninsula and its hostile policy toward the DPRK has already gone bankrupt.
					
					 The chairman of the Executive Committee of the Warsaw Regional Committee of the Polish Communist Party noted that it is quite natural for the DPRK to bolster its nuclear deterrence for self-defence to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to cogitate about the DPRK and make such policy decision to totally roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and lift all steps pursuant to it.
					
					 The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement urged the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK before anything else if it is truly concerned for the peaceful development of the Korean people and their well-being.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Romania in its statement said that under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un the Korean people would achieve greater victory in their struggle for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and building an economic power despite the U.S. imperialists' unprecedented moves to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Solidarity Expressed for Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Solidarity Expressed for Korean People's Just Cause
						
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign personages made public a joint statement on Jan. 13 in support of the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. They included Director General Harish Gupta and Secretary General Mukesh Sharma of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, Sadhna Harish, chairwoman of the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics, and S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il who is a director of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea.
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year address clarified his firm stand and will to resolutely foil challenges and moves of the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces and invariably defend Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's New Year address serves as a treasured sword instilling conviction in victory and optimism into the progressives aspiring after independence.
					
					 The U.S. interference in the Korean issue is disturbing the reunification of the Korean peninsula and creating a great hurdle in the way of achieving regional peace and security.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year address stressed that it is possible to resume the suspended high-level contacts if the south Korean authorities are sincere in their stand to improve the inter-Korean relations through dialogue.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respond to this ardent call if they truly want reunification.
					
					 We, followers of the Juche idea, Songun idea, fully support Kim Jong Un's New Year address and extend solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause of firmly protecting Korean-style socialism from all plots of the imperialists and achieving the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mexico
						
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on Jan. 8.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life characterized by love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also clarifies important matters arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in India, Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in India, Ethiopia
						
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A seminar and round-table talks on the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un took place in India and Ethiopia on Jan. 11 and 12.
					 Present there were personages of various circles and masses in those countries.
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il said that Kim Jong Un's New Year address is instilling strong conviction and courage into the adherents to the Juche idea across the world.
					
					 They praised Kim Jong Un for clarifying his magnanimous and bold stand on national reunification, the greatest cherished desire of the Korean nation.
					
					 They urged the south Korean authorities to stop their reckless war exercises at once.
					
					 They disclosed the fact that the U.S. interference in Korea is blocking the reunification of Korea and, furthermore, laying a great hurdle in the way of achieving peace and security in the region. 
					
					 They demanded the U.S. forces withdraw from south Korea at once.
					
					 They emphasized that Kim Jong Un's saying that it is possible to resume the suspended high-level contacts if the south Korean authorities have a sincere stand to improve the inter-Korean relations through dialogue represents a broad-minded proposal for sincerely mending the relations and bringing earlier national reunification.
					
					 They reiterated belief that the Korean people would firmly defend Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses and certainly achieve the country's independent and peaceful reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Figures of the Gabriel Hospital and Araya Dental Hospital of Ethiopia said that Kim Jong Un's New Year address helped them know better  about popular policies of the DPRK in which everything serves the popular masses and the Korean people would be provided with a happier life in the near future thanks to his love for the people.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in India.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Proposal for Country's Reunification Supported in Austria, Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Proposal for Country's Reunification Supported in Austria, Indonesia
						
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- An Austrian organization and Indonesian personage expressed full support for the proposal for national reunification made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					 The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria in its statement on Jan. 5 fully supported the New Year address made by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It said:
					
					 We are convinced that the DPRK will make big progress in the efforts for achieving the peaceful reunification of the Korean peninsula this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 We strongly demand the U.S. government come out for sincere negotiations with the DPRK for peace and the south Korean authorities mend the inter-Korean relations and stop war exercises against the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 Shapril Arsiyad, chairman of the Indonesian Federation of Transport Workers Unions, said in his statement on Jan. 12:
					
					 We consider the proposal for improving the north-south relations and achieving national reunification made by Kim Jong Un in his New Year address as the most fair and aboveboard and realistic one and voice full support and solidarity with it. 
					
					 We extend support and solidarity to the DPRK government's will and its efforts to usher in an era of peace, reunification and prosperity by successfully implementing the July 4 joint statement, historic June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration this year, too.
					
					 We hold that the south Korean authorities should take sincere practical actions to mend the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno Combinado de Alimentos Kumkop para Deportistas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno Combinado de Alimentos Kumkop para Deportistas
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Combinado de Alimentos Kumkop para Deportistas.
					El Mariscal dijo que aunque se construyo hace unos anos la fabrica, fue afamada en todo el pais y se elevan de dia a dia la popularidad y la demanda sobre los productos de ella.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos del combinado, el Mariscal estudio en detalles el estado de produccion y operacion.
					
					Se alegro mucho de que la fabrica, que cuenta con poca mano de obra y una superficie de produccion no grande, produce gran cantidad de alimentos.
					
					Evaluo que el combinado produce los productos de diferentes variedades y fabrica por su propia cuenta los materiales de embalaje haciendo de manera cultural el embalaje de mercancias con tecnologia avanzada.
					
					Senalo que el combinado se situa en el lugar importante en desarrollar la industria alimentaria del pais para no hablar de la rama deportiva.
					
					Anadio que el combinado debe dar prioridad a la labor para producir mucho los alimentos de diferentes variedades que facilitaran a la administracion nutritiva y recuperacion de fatiga de los deportistas y elevar sin parar su calidad.
					
					Subrayo que el combinado, sin vanagloriarse de los exitos de hoy, debe hacer ingentes esfuerzos por desarrollar y producir los alimentos necesarios apremiantemente a los deportistas inclusive el chicle y aptos a la constitucion fisica de los coreanos.
					
					Instruyo la necesidad de normalizar la produccion y asegurar a cabalidad la estabilidad higienica de los alimentos al realizar en el nivel elevado la informatizacion de la gestion, la automatizacion y la esterilizacion de los procesos productivos.
					
					Seguidamente paso revista a las facilidades de servicio publico y el invernadero del combinado.
					
					El secreto de los exitos en todas las labores depende totalmente de los funcionarios, acoto y evaluo altamente los meritos de Ri Jong Ho y otros funcionarios de sectores correspondientes y del combinado quienes hacen bien la administracion y el mantenimiento empresarial con una vision innovadora para la materializacion de la politica del partido.
					
					Manifesto esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y otros empleados del combinado cumpliran con su papel vanguardista en desarrollar el deporte y la industria alimentaria y tomo una foto de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Il Hwan y Han Kwang Sang, jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y Kim Yo Jong, subjefa de departamento del CC del PTC.
